summary: I intend to practice general endocrinology; however I am pursuing additional training in the area of obesity medicine and hope to bring this expertise to the practice I join. My background in nutrition science and exercise, as well as my clinical experience in weight management and bariatric clinics, and research endeavors in clinical weight loss trials will enable me to develop the skills I need to supervise and direct patients in their weight loss efforts. I am open to working in both the inpatient and outpatient setting as my fellowship training has equipped me to manage inpatient diabetes and endocrine consults.

experience.title: Emergency Department Physician
experience.description: Emergency Department physician; provides patient care and is prepared to manage inpatient diabetes and endocrine consults as part of fellowship training.

experience.title: Fitness Instructor
experience.description: Delivered fitness instruction and related wellness guidance.

experience.title: Medical Clinic Assistant
experience.description: Assisted clinic operations; supported physicians Richard Field, MD and Naveeda T. Ahmed, MD.

experience.title: Research Lab Assistant
experience.description: Worked in a medical research lab; contributed to health services and obesity-related research projects.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science, Family and Consumer Sciences, Nutrition Science

certifications: ABIM Board Certified in Internal Medicine, 2014
North Carolina State Medical License, active, July 2013 to present
